languages.text: {n}Из вокса Паскаля доносится мучительный вздох. Когда он оборачивается к вам, его глаза чуть прищуриваются, словно под аугментом-респиратором он слабо улыбается.{/n} "Думаю, все конечно. Я поступил правильно".
{n}A pained sigh comes from Pasqal's vox. When he turns to you, his eyes crease slightly, as if he is smiling weakly behind his respirator unit.{/n} "I think it is over. I did what was right."
languages.original_text: {n}Из вокса Паскаля доносится мучительный вздох. Когда он оборачивается к вам, его глаза чуть прищуриваются, словно под аугментом-респиратором он слабо улыбается.{/n} "Думаю, все конечно. Я поступил правильно".

traits.locale_text: {n}A pained sigh comes from Pasqal's vox. When he turns to you, he squints a little, as if smiling weakly behind his breathing augmetic.{/n} "I think it is over. I did what was right."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}A pained sigh comes from Pasqal's vox. When he turns to you, he squints a little, as if smiling weakly behind his breathing augmetic.{/n} "I think it is over. I did what was right."

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}A pained sigh comes from Pasqal's vox. When he turns to you, his eyes crease slightly, as if he is smiling weakly behind his respirator unit.{/n} "I think it is over. I did what was right."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}悲痛なため息がパスカルのヴォクスからこぼれてくる。彼はあなたの方を向くと、レスピレイター・ユニットに隠れて弱々しく笑うかのようにわずかに目にシワを寄せた。{/n}「終わったのだと思います。自分は適切に対処しました」
languages.original_text: {n}A pained sigh comes from Pasqal's vox. When he turns to you, his eyes crease slightly, as if he is smiling weakly behind his respirator unit.{/n} "I think it is over. I did what was right."

traits.locale_text: {n}悲痛なため息がパスカルのヴォクスからこぼれてくる。彼はあなたの方を向くと、レスピレイター・ユニットに隠れて弱々しく笑うかのようにわずかに目にシワを寄せた。{/n}「終わったのだと思います。自分は適切に対処しました」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡的音阵发出一声痛苦的叹息。他转向你，微微地眯了一下眼睛，仿佛他在呼吸器后面虚弱地微笑一样。{/n}“我觉得这样就算是结束了，我做了正确的事情。”
languages.original_text: {n}A pained sigh comes from Pasqal's vox. When he turns to you, his eyes crease slightly, as if he is smiling weakly behind his respirator unit.{/n} "I think it is over. I did what was right."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡的音阵发出一声痛苦的叹息。他转向你，眯了一下眼睛，仿佛他在呼吸器后面虚弱地微笑一样。{/n}“我觉得这样就算是结束了，我做了正确的事情。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le vox de Pasqal laisse échapper un soupir peiné, mais il finit par se tourner vers vous avec les yeux légèrement plissés, comme si son respirateur dissimulait un sourire.{/n} « Je crois que c'est terminé. J'ai fait ce qu'il fallait. »
languages.original_text: {n}A pained sigh comes from Pasqal's vox. When he turns to you, his eyes crease slightly, as if he is smiling weakly behind his respirator unit.{/n} "I think it is over. I did what was right."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le vox de Pasqal laisse échapper un soupir peiné, mais il finit par se tourner vers vous avec les yeux légèrement plissés, comme si son respirateur dissimulait un sourire.{/n} « Je crois que c'est terminé. J'ai fait ce qu'il fallait. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}El voco de Pasqal produce un suspiro de dolor. Cuando se gira hacia ti, entrecierra un poco los ojos, como si sonriese levemente bajo su unidad respiradora.{/n} «Creo que ya está. He hecho lo correcto».
languages.original_text: {n}A pained sigh comes from Pasqal's vox. When he turns to you, his eyes crease slightly, as if he is smiling weakly behind his respirator unit.{/n} "I think it is over. I did what was right."

traits.locale_text: {n}El voco de Pasqal produce un suspiro de dolor. Cuando se gira hacia ti, entrecierra un poco los ojos, como si sonriese levemente bajo su unidad respiradora.{/n} «Creo que ya está. He hecho lo correcto».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ein gequältes Seufzen ertönt aus Pasqals Vox. Als er sich zu dir umdreht, verengt er die Augen ein wenig, als würde er hinter seinem Respirator schwach lächeln.{/n} "Ich glaube, es ist vorbei. Ich habe das Richtige getan."
languages.original_text: {n}A pained sigh comes from Pasqal's vox. When he turns to you, his eyes crease slightly, as if he is smiling weakly behind his respirator unit.{/n} "I think it is over. I did what was right."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein gequältes Seufzen ertönt aus Pasqals Vox. Als er sich zu dir umdreht, kneift er die Augen ein wenig zusammen, als würde er hinter seinem Respirator schwach lächeln.{/n} "Ich glaube, es ist vorbei. Ich habe das Richtige getan."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal'ın voksundan acılı bir iç çekiş geliyor. Sana döndüğünde, solunum maskesinin ardından hafifçe gülümsüyormuş gibi gözlerini hafifçe kısıyor.{/n} "Sanıyorum bitti. Doğru olanı yaptım."
languages.original_text: {n}A pained sigh comes from Pasqal's vox. When he turns to you, his eyes crease slightly, as if he is smiling weakly behind his respirator unit.{/n} "I think it is over. I did what was right."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal'ın voksundan gelen acılı bir iç çekiş duyuluyor. Sana döndüğünde, solunum maskesinin arkasında hafifçe gülümsüyor gibi gözleri hafifçe kısılıyor.{/n} "Sanıyorum bitti. Doğru olanı yaptım."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
